Reviews.Title: Wrong Case
Reviews.Author: Discorporated
Reviews.Content: the camera case that came with this only has a strap on one side and has no pocket.  I paid the extra 14 bucks figuring I'd get a convenient case along with everything else.  everything else came in good condition, but I would have forgone everything else and just bought a case and memory card myself if I'd known this.

Reviews.Title: bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Vdubnluvn
Reviews.Content: before i got this camera i coudnt spell photographer , now im iz one. Very easy to produce high quality photos.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1 effective megapixel, 1/2.3-inch high-sensitivity CMOS sensor
3-inch TFT color LCD with wide viewing angle
25mm wide-angle lens with optical image stabilizer
20x optical zoom, 4x digital zoom and 80x combined zoom
Full 1080p HD video with stereo sound
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX260 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera (Black) + 8GB Accessory Kit
